gui.polymer.locator.control.rotate.title: Rotate
gui.polymer.locator.control.anchor.title: Anchor
gui.polymer.locator.control.anchor.descr: Anchor the multiblock in a position
[Right Click] on a block place or move
[Right Click] on the air to cancel anchor
gui.polymer.locator.control.flip.title: Flip
gui.polymer.locator.control.flip.descrip: [Right Click] on the air to cancel anchor
Can only be applied to multiblocks marked as 'symmetrical'
gui.polymer.locator.control.layer.title: Choose Layer
gui.polymer.locator.control.assemble.des: [Right Click] the center block to assemble it
Will hide the schematic if not locked
gui.polymer.locator.control.move_x.title: Move X
gui.polymer.locator.control.move_x.descr: Move the multiblock with X axis
gui.polymer.locator.control.move_y.title: Move Y
gui.polymer.locator.control.move_y.descr: Move the multiblock with Z axis
gui.polymer.locator.control.move_z.title: Move Z
gui.polymer.locator.control.move_z.descr: Move the multiblock with Z axis
